scripts.test:integration: yarn run build:functions && firebase emulators:exec 'jest --config=./jest/jest.integration.config.js --verbose' --project staging
scripts.test:e2e: yarn run build:functions && firebase emulators:exec 'jest --config=./jest/jest.e2e.config.js --verbose' --project staging
scripts.deploy:staging: yarn run build:functions && firestore deploy --only firestore,firestore:rules,firestore:indexes --project staging && cd functions && npm run deploy:staging
scripts.deploy:production: firestore deploy --only firestore,firestore:rules,firestore:indexes --project production && cd functions && npm run deploy:production
